elements.name: NeuropathyText
elements.html: Polyneuropathy refers to the weakening of motor function due to neurological degeneration, particularly the weakening and loss of control over the hind-end.

elements.name: NeuropathyText
elements.html: Younger dogs with idiopathic LP often don't have show signs of hind-end weakness.

elements.name: NeuropathySymptomsDidHave
elements.title: In the {durationOfSymptomsInMonths} months since LP/GOLPP symptoms appeared, did {CmpnName} ever show signs of polyneuropathy, i.e. hind-end weakness or incontinence?
